Name: Promise-Breaker
Description: You must break any promises you make to players.
AdvancedDescription: This only applies to player promises, not owners.

Name: Bonus Boy
Description: You must not have any bonuses in any player contract negotiations.
AdvancedDescription: This only counts in contract negotiations, you use bonuses/clauses when buying the player.

Name: Indecisive Leader
Description: You must change your captain after every loss.
AdvancedDescription: This is only for competitive matches.

Name: Old is Gold
Description: You may not have any players under the age of 32 in your starting lineup.

Name: Age Squeeze
Description: Each season the minimum age of players that you can use increases by 1.
AdvancedDescription: The ages starts at 18. This is mainly for long saves.
